comment: Great professor, my favorite up until this point. He really knows what he is talking about and if you ask him a question you'll get an answer. Really engaging lectures, they were super interesting and fun. TAKE HIS CLASS! Lab was a little more difficult, but he gave plenty of time for questions and answered them thoroughly.
Grades very difficult!!! This class was harder than it needed to be because of his grading criteria on his essays/papers.

Very good feedback with two manuscripts and one pig dissection. Lets you know what to expect and I would recommend printing lab sheets before class. The pre lab quizzes are difficult but he does not create them so take your time and look over protocol and other resources provided in the lab folder.

Straight forward teacher. You have 4 test 60 questions a piece and the final which is 100 questions. The final is open note open book with no lock down browser. Gave study guides that represented the test and held study sessions the weekend prior to the test. Takes a while to responds to emails but always answer questions. Enjoyable lectures.

I don't know how Professor Penick has such good reviews. He is the most arrogant professor I've ever had to take. He gets easily frustrated when you don't immediately understand a concept and asks rhetorical questions like we're stupid. Not only does he have an attitude problem, but his class is also insanely boring and lecture-heavy. Avoid!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I always do good in my classes and in this class, Dr. Penick graded as if its the end of the world. He is a really tough grader no matter how well you do his assignments. I dont understand how 100% of the people would take him again. I would most likely not. He is very nice but is a terrible grader. We had a manuscript + the whole class did awful

Even though attendance isnt mandatory, Id recommend going because they are actually so fun and engaging. Also almost everything from his tests are talked about in lecture and his study guides are really helpful. Best of all, ALL tests are open note, even the final. He is also super understanding and helpful. Favorite teacher Ive ever had.

My favorite teacher so far! He has true passion for his subject and teaches his class like a story. His exams are straight forward, but they are solely based on his lectures. I definitely will take his class again if I have a chance

Best teacher there is! His lectures are informative but fun, his assignments are not difficult, and he is a very interesting, colorful character. His tests are open note, his review sessions are helpful, and his homework actually teaches something. He is unapologetically passionate about science, and a great standard for other professors to follow.

His lectures are aesthetically pleasing! He is a great dude, he's adorable, he's passionate about what he teaches. As the semester continues you find more cool facts about him. Biology is a bit hard but he makes it simple. Love him! Recorded lectures and VERY slack late policy (I submitted hw 3 weeks late and made a 100)
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Awesome, Lenient due dates, open note tests, interesting lectures, ill miss him sm :/

Professor Penick is really nice but the lab is hearder than it needs to be. There are 3 labsters and those are easy to follow. Two of the main lab reports are hard and he does not explain it but yet grades them hard. He does does not curve your grade, so be ready to work for the grade you want.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: Hes great ! Really down to earth and hes not a harsh grader. I took him online. We had 3 labsters, and 2 lab manuscript papers. He also gave us a few assignments but they werent that difficult. If you try youll get an A.

Whether you are a biology major or are someone needing a biology class I 100% recommend Mr. Penick as your professor! He is super down to earth, tries to make lectures more fun, and prepares you for the material you need to know for your tests. There are bonus points for every test and there is no homework or textbook required. TAKE HIM!

Dr. Penick is the most passionate professor I had ever had!! He is absolutely AMAZING! if you actually want to learn then take him! There is no homework and textbook not required. 3 tests and 1 final. But he gives you study guides and posts all lectures online. Also gives bonus points. Tests are not too bad as long as you study the study guide.
